segments.text: Something awful happened . We went to the Portobello Road , and someone stole my handbag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , dear . Did you lose a lot of money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Only a few pounds . But my passport was in the bag . That ’ what I ’ m really worry about .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must tell the embassy about it . And I think they ’ ll issue you with a new one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . But you mustn ’ t leave it too long . Did you report it the police ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I couldn ’ t find a policeman .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . You must report that it ’ s been stolen . And give the police description of your bag . You ’ d better go to the local police station tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ ll do it tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be too upset . It ’ s not the end of the world .
segments.speaker: S1
